ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If it gets to be too big a problem, they could let critters loot the players they kill and equip the items they get.  There s a scarry thought! =)  A mob
ygData.messageBody:
At 06:28 AM 05/24/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
>Dont worry,
> Most of these characters are the second characters of some high level
>players. These players then hand their unused items to friends who
>then hand them to the newbie character.
> The only problem with this is that the item will not be that useful
>to the new low level character. This person will receive the benefits
>of the robes but due to their low level, will still get pounded by orc
>pawns without problem. Level has the majority factor in these cases.
>Yes it irritates me too. Im level 21 and still have these stupid Sr.
>Apprentice robes.

If it gets to be too big a problem, they could let critters loot the
players they kill and equip the items they get. There's a scarry thought!
=) A mob of 8 or 9 pawns and cents storming the newbie areas around
Felwithe with mino axes and patchwork taken from fallen heroes.

<shrug> Just a though. Of course I also think wizards should get
dual-wield - not for anything as mundane as physical combat; I just think
it would be cool to sit by the lake and fish with two poles. =)

-Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
